text: Hi, do you post to Australia? My mum has been to your store in Singapore every time she visits. Any chance of posting to Australia?

answers.text: @taniabusby26 Hi there! We used to post to Australia via the national post airmail. However due to the current pandemic, we understand that it may not be very reliable (i.e. super long delivery time and parcels getting misplaced). As such, we highly recommend courier by DHL to ensure that the products will reach you. If you’re keen on this, do drop us a PM so that we can check the rates for you.
